page.title: 09TRAVELLING PEOPLE
page.content:
Travelling people are living just off Kilbowie Road. Last week Clydebank District Council told them they had to move because they were living on a site earmarked for next month's fair.
This time there is nothing the council can do about moving the travellers__despite objections by local residents.
They are obliged to let them stay on that site until an official one has been created somewhere within Clydebank or Bearsden and Milngavie. The two District authorities plan to get together as soon as possible to decide on a site big enough to hold 12 caravans.
